data.text: @MarceloPLima My problem with $SHOP is the “did covid change your business for the better or did it help it?” For $SE and $MELI it is the former, but I am not seeing the creativity from management with Shopify.
@MarceloPLima I’m looking forward to a no Covid $AAPL
@acemacro @MarceloPLima are rates going up ...?? in this context ...up  a lot??
@lauraacmp @MarceloPLima Not really. Draw a decade long trendline. What was crazy was the insane valuations due to low rates, is just reversing now.
@acemacro @MarceloPLima yes I understand..but as much as this...it s crazy
@MarceloPLima how is it possible to erase a period in which the company did great? it was a real growth...
